title: Vladimir Putin's Signature Brings Digital Ruble Into Russia's Tax Code
description: Russia's digital ruble has been integrated into the nation's tax code after its President Vladimir Putin signed the move into law.

title: Bitcoin ETF issuers push 3 crypto ads in 48 hours
description:
Three commercials for Bitcoin ETFs have appeared this week as the marketing war between competing asset managers heats up.

Spot Bitcoin (BTC) exchange-traded fund (ETF) issuers have fired two new salvos in a brewing crypto marketing war, rolling out a total of three crypto ads in just two days.

Bitwise rolled the first Bitcoin ETF advertisement on Dec. 18 featuring actor Jonathan Goldsmith, known for his "Most Interesting Man in the World" character.

Days later on Dec. 20, Hashdex published its crypto advertisement featuring a dumper truck with the captions “Stocks aren’t crypto, fixed income isn’t crypto, precious metals? nope, not crypto either,” before promoting the firm.

Read more
